resources.string: International TAXI can guarantee the best convenience to all businessman and tourists who visit Korea. International TAXI will do our very best for your comfortable and pleasant ride. You can get a special care by taxi drivers before, during, and after their ride. Whether you need us for business or pleasure, International TAXI can get you where you need to go, so give us a try!

Are you experiencing living difficulties in Seoul due to the language barrier? The Happy Call Service for Foreigners will make your life in Seoul easier and happier. The 120 Dasan Call Center will offer the \'Happy Call Service for Foreigners\' starting in April 2011. Our counselors speaking foreign languages will call you once or twice a week to provide useful information on everyday life in Seoul. Fill out the following application form and the 120 Dasan Call Center counselors will make you feel at home with their friendly counseling services on diverse matters.

↑
PRESS THE ABOVE BUTTON
and SELECT CATEGORY
to show list.
Useful Informations of Seoul travel via wikitravel.org
Official Mobile page about Incheon airport
Internet newspaper for foreigners in Korea, with news on culture and social affairs.
After connected,\n PRESS 9\n to select a language

Producers :
 Woo Jae Kyung
 Jo Mi Yeon
 Kim Soo Hyeon



Designed by Freepik

 Most Images designed by Freepik (http://www.freepik.com)
 Most Icons made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com


 Uses APIs :
 Seoul Open API (외국인 생활안내 Directory 분류코드 정보)
 Seoul Open API (외국인 생활안내 Directory 정보)
 Seoul Open API (서울 관광명소정보(분류별_영어))
 Yahoo API (환율 xchange)
 Microsoft translate API (번역)


 Uses Library :
 com.android.support:appcompat-v7:23.1.0
 com.android.support:design:23.1.0
 com.android.support:support-v4:+
 com.squareup.picasso:picasso:2.3.2
 com.nineoldandroids:library:2.4.0
 com.daimajia.slider:library:1.1.5@aar
 microsoft-translator-java-api-0.6.2-jar-with-dependencies
